creator: mchassagneux@apache.org
text:
Created attachment 32920
Instant rate column in the summury report table

Actually, the Throughput column in the summary report table take the whole test to calculate the rate. 
I've made this little dirty hack to add a column, which indicate the rate since last 5 second. 

Could you look at it. 

Hope the patch is right this one.

creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
text:
This is now available within the HTML report in a more configurable way.
Closing as wontfix.
Thanks
